notes_text: Possession of less than 15 grams (½ oz) has been decriminalized since 1 January 2010. Since January 1, 2026, it has been legal for persons over the age of 21 to possess up to 100 g of cannabis at home and up to 25 g in public, and to grow up to 3 plants. Medical use has been legal and regulated since 2013.
